attributes.action: Remove RT as a news source from our tv channels.
attributes.additional_details: The government must stop this channel influencing people here in the UK with their Russian propaganda. The government should stop them broadcasting from the London studios a stones throw away from the houses of parliament and it should not be a choice as a news channel on our tv's.
attributes.background: People think that RT the Russian government funded media site is an "alternative" news media channel.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the removal of TV broadcasters. Ofcom is the UK’s independent communications regulator. It's responsible for regulating broadcasting and communications networks.

You can find out how to complain to Ofcom here: 

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/complain-to-ofcom
